otherNames: MD Geist II: Death Force, 装鬼兵MDガイスト2
synopsis: In this sequel to the original MD Geist story, the Death Force has been let loose on the planet. These robots are out to kill and otherwise hurt every living thing that's left.A little annoyed about this, the remaining people decide that they've had enough... and of course Geist himself will confront another one of those Most Dangerous soldiers that we've heard so much about...
